long: Meaning: to "live", whether literally or figuratively; causatively, to "revive".  Usage: keep (leave, make) alive, × certainly, give (promise) life, (let, suffer to) live, nourish up, preserve (alive), quicken, recover, repair, restore (to life), revive, (× God) save (alive, life, lives), × surely, be whole.  Source: a primitive root (compare "H2331", "H2421");
